CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Crimson Group?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {above} Crimson Group in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Enterprises relative to Oracle Systems?
SRP.A: Starburst Enterprises is {below} Oracle Systems in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Luminara Solutions?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {below} Luminara Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Group}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starburst Enterprises}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Solutions's minimum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Solutions's minimum Patent Applications is in {1974}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Dynamics's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Dynamics's maximum Patent Applications is in {1972}.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1982, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1985 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1979 and 1982 was {lower} than between 1985 and 1990.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 1972 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 1972 was {lower} than in 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1982, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 1992?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 1975 and 1982 was {smaller} than between 1979 and 1992.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1984, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1973 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1982 and 1984 was {lower} than between 1973 and 1993.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Group} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Echo Dynamics and Crimson Group first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Echo Dynamics and Crimson Group first exchanged leading positions in {1973}.
